name: Balancer DAO Fee and Bribes Reinvest
description: Accepts {{token}} to earn a continuous share of [Balancer.Fi](https://app.balancer.fi/) fees and balancer DAO voting bribes. Earned [bb-a-USD](https://app.balancer.fi/#/ethereum/pool/0xa13a9247ea42d743238089903570127dda72fe4400000000000000000000035d) (Balancer's aave boosted stable pool) fees and rewards are harvested, swapped for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Swap happens either via market-buy or mint, depending which is more capital efficient.
